pullrequest.title: Fix genomedata-open-data interface and usage specification

content.raw: It should be possible to have `gdarchive` still be the last argument even with `--tracknames` having a `nargs='+'` itself. Try adding the `gdarchive` argument *after* tracknames. If that doesn't work, ask on Stack Overflow for another solution.
content.html: It should be possible to have gdarchive still be the last argument even with --tracknames having a nargs='+' itself. Try adding the gdarchive argument after tracknames. If that doesn't work, ask on Stack Overflow for another solution.
